You are experiencing the following symptoms:

I’ve also been feeling pretty fatigued and nauseous, and I’ve had some chills and headaches that won’t go away. I’m worried because I’ve been exposed to rodents, and I’m starting to feel worse even though I’ve been resting.

I’ve been feeling dizzy and super tired, and I just can’t seem to shake off the chills and headache. I work outside on my farm, and I was cleaning out this old barn with a lot of rodent droppings and urine, so I think I might have just… I don’t know, caught something? I’m worried because I’m feeling worse even though I’ve been resting.
